Comment: 3-in-1 TVS diodes for USB data line filtering. These diodes should protect the two differential data lines and the positive power line.
"Transmit" and "receive" LEDs - use whatever colors you prefer. D2 is "receive", D3 is "transmit". It's probably a good idea to use different colors.

Micro-USB connector for battery charging and USB communication. I'm still working through a reel of cheap-o micro-B sockets that I ordered awhile ago, but they seem to fit the "Wuerth_629105150521" footprint in KiCAD.
One of two resistors used in a voltage divider required by the internal voltage regulator.
One of two resistors used in a voltage divider required by the internal voltage regulator.
R3 is the reset pin's pull-up resistor. R4 and R5 are current-limiting resistors for the "transmit" and "receive" LEDs.
The main USB / UART bridge chip.
